description: Yuanwu owns a boxing gym where he teaches martial arts and health management. He is well-respected in the community for his cordial demeanor and pleasant temperament.

skills.name: Leihuangquan
skills.description: Basic Attack Yuanwu performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG. Heavy Attack Yuanwu consumes Stamina to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG. Mid-air Attack Yuanwu consumes Stamina to launch a Mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing Electro DMG. Dodge Counter Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

skills.name: Leihuang Master
skills.description: Thunder Wedge Yuanwu summons Thunder Wedge, dealing Electro DMG, and forms a Thunder Field centered on the Thunder Wedge. Thunder Wedge lasts for 12s. Forte Circuit Rumbling Spark and Resonance Liberation Blazing Might will immediately detonate Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge on the field, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Resonance Skill Damage. Thunder Field The on-field character gains the effects below when in the Thunder Field: a Coordinated Attack from Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge is triggered when attacks hit a target, dealing Electro DMG. This can be triggered once every 1.2s. The effect lasts for 1.5s.

skills.name: Blazing Might
skills.description: Awaken the power of thunder and provide Forte Circuit Lightning Infused status for all nearby characters for 10s, granting them increased Anti-interruption, then perform a powerful blow that deals Electro DMG.

skills.name: Thunderweaver
skills.description: The damage multiplier of Resonance Skill Thunder Uprising is increased by 40%, and its depletion of enemy Vibration Strength is enhanced.

skills.name: Reserved Confidence
skills.description: The ranges of the Resonance Skill Thunder Field and Thunder Uprising are greatly expanded. When exiting during combat, if Readiness is not full, Yuanwu will automatically leave 1 Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge in place.

skills.name: Thunder Bombardment
skills.description: Attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

skills.name: Unassuming Blade
skills.description: Rumbling Spark When "Readiness" is full, long press Resonance Skill to consume all "Readiness" and cast Rumbling Spark, dealing Electro DMG and entering the Lightning Infused state. Thunder Uprising When you have full "Readiness", Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge will cast Thunder Uprising, dealing Electro DMG. Lightning Infused The character in Lightning Infused state has a greatly increased anti-interruption. When Yuanwu is in this state: -Basic Attacks: Hits targets in a larger range, depletes enemy Vibration Strength faster; -Heavy Attacks: Attack speed is increased, deplete enemy Vibration Strength faster; -Dodge Counters: Attack speed is increased, deplete enemy Vibration Strength faster. -Use Basic Attack within 3s after casting a Heavy Attack or a successful Counterattack to cast Thunderweaver, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Basic Attack damage; Yuanwu does not recover "Readiness" in this state. Readiness Yuanwu can hold up to 100 "Readiness". When Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge is on the field, Yuanwu gains 6 "Readiness" every second, even when he is not the on-field character; When Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge hits a target with a Coordinated Attack, Yuanwu gains 5 "Readiness".

skills.name: Skillful Cooking
skills.description: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

skills.name: Lightning Manipulation
skills.description: Yuanwu unleashes thunderbolts in an area centered around the skill target, weakening the Vibration Strength of enemies upon impact.

resonanceChain.name: Steaming Cup of Justice
resonanceChain.description: When Yuanwu is in Forte Circuit's Lightning Infused state, his Basic Attack Speed is increased by {0}, and his Heavy Attack Speed is increased by {1}.

resonanceChain.name: Fierce Heart, Serene Mind
resonanceChain.description: Intro Skill Thunder Bombardment additionally recovers {0} Resonance Energy for Yuanwu.

resonanceChain.name: Upholder of Integrity
resonanceChain.description: When the Coordinated Attacks of Resonance Skill's Thunder Wedge hits a target, the damage is additionally increased by {0} of Yuanwu's DEF.

resonanceChain.name: Retributive Knuckles
resonanceChain.description: When casting Resonance Liberation Blazing Might, the on-field character will gain a Shield equal to {0} of Yuanwu's DEF for {1}s.

resonanceChain.name: Neighborhood Protector
resonanceChain.description: When Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge is on the field, Yuanwu's Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus is increased by {0}.

resonanceChain.name: Defender of All Realms
resonanceChain.description: All team members nearby within the range of Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge will gain a {0} DEF increase, lasting {1}s.

quote: Assuming I've thought my decisions through and acted with integrity, I am content.

quoteLocalized.vi: Nếu tôi đã suy nghĩ kỹ lưỡng về quyết định của mình và hành động một cách chính trực, tôi hài lòng.
quoteLocalized.id: Jika saya telah memikirkan keputusan saya dengan matang dan bertindak dengan integritas, saya merasa puas.
quoteLocalized.th: ถ้าฉันคิดไตร่ตรองการตัดสินใจของตัวเองอย่างถี่ถ้วนและกระทำด้วยความซื่อสัตย์ ฉันก็พอใจแล้ว
quoteLocalized.ru: Если я тщательно обдумал свои решения и действовал честно, то я спокоен.

descriptionLocalized.vi: Yuanwu sở hữu một phòng tập boxing nơi anh dạy võ thuật và quản lý sức khỏe. Anh được cộng đồng tôn trọng vì phong thái lịch thiệp và tính cách dễ chịu.
descriptionLocalized.id: Yuanwu memiliki sasana tinju tempat dia mengajarkan seni bela diri dan manajemen kesehatan. Dia sangat dihormati di masyarakat karena sikapnya yang ramah dan temperamennya yang menyenangkan.
descriptionLocalized.th: หยวนอู่เป็นเจ้าของยิมมวยที่เขาสอนศิลปะการต่อสู้และการจัดการสุขภาพ เขามีชื่อเสียงในชุมชนด้วยบุคลิกที่เป็นมิตรและอัธยาศัยดี
descriptionLocalized.ru: Юаньву владеет боксерским залом, где обучает боевым искусствам и управлению здоровьем. Он пользуется уважением в обществе за свой дружелюбный характер и приятный нрав.
